name: Pleiadians
overview_md: Claimed origin associated with the Pleiades open cluster (M45), often centered on Alcyone. Cultural claim plotted for reference.
sources: claim: New Age channeling literature; Pleiades = M45/Alcyone

name: Greys
overview_md: Claimed origin linked to the Zeta Reticuli pair. Cultural claim plotted for reference.
sources: claim: UFO lore; Zeta² Reticuli star

name: Sirians
overview_md: Claimed origin associated with Sirius A in Canis Major. No scientific evidence; cultural claim.
sources: claim: esoteric texts; Sirius A is real star

name: Arcturians
overview_md: Claimed origin associated with Arcturus. Cultural claim.
sources: claim: channeling; Arcturus is real star

name: Andromedans
overview_md: Claimed origin associated with the Andromeda Galaxy (M31). Cultural claim.

name: Lyrans
overview_md: Claimed origin associated with Vega in Lyra. Cultural claim.
sources: claim: New Age lore; Vega star

name: Orion Group (claimed)
overview_md: Claimed grouping linked to Orion (often Rigel/Betelgeuse). Cultural claim.
